messages.subject: Toddler Calculus
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/3/2004 9:01:15 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Laura~Maine who is trying to stay out of the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/3/2004 9:01:15 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

Laura~Maine who is trying to stay out of the teaching a 3yr old calculus
conversation on the local list (grumble, grumble, roar!)



***********************************
Your four year old doesn't already do calculus? My, the rest of us had our
kids doing calculus by 2.75. How do you ever expect her to get into
college...it's VERY competitive these days!

I guess you'll have to do some remedial work.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
